definition: to make an offering to the gods/variant of 饋|馈[kui4]
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)

sentences.english: You have bees to thank every time you drizzle some honey into your tea.
sentences.chinese: 每次在茶中滴入蜂蜜时你都要感谢蜜蜂的馈赠。

sentences.english: He declined your offer with thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他对你的馈赠婉言谢绝了。

sentences.english: But what is the "spiritual achievement" the Transcendentalists have bequeathed to us?
sentences.chinese: 但是，先验论者馈赠给我们的“精神实现”是什么？

sentences.english: Officially, at least, blood was transformed from a product into a gift.
sentences.chinese: 血液从此正式从商品转化成为了馈赠品。

sentences.english: They are also elegant and valuable presents for your friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 唐三彩还可以作为高雅而珍贵的礼品来馈赠亲友。

sentences.english: Of course, it is also out gift of taste.
sentences.chinese: 当然它也是出门在外馈赠之佳品。

sentences.english: Every man has owed much to others , and ought to repay the kindness that has received .
sentences.chinese: 每个人都欠别人的，理应馈赠他已得到的仁慈。

sentences.english: Lucky generous, carry convenience is tasted the friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥大方，携带方便是馈赠亲朋好友之佳品。

sentences.english: This is what I give you the most evil of the toxin , and most sweet gift.
sentences.chinese: 这是吾赋予汝之最邪恶的毒素，也是最甜美的馈赠。

sentences.english: I leaned about its gifts one July evening in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我就是于七月里一夜在山间获其馈赠的。

sentences.english: Members can then create a physical cookbook. This is great for gifts.
sentences.chinese: 会员可据此自创一本食谱书，用它馈赠亲友。

sentences.english: Ganba embroidery, with elegant taste, is quality goods for guests.
sentences.chinese: 干坝绣情趣高雅，是馈赠贵客之佳品。

sentences.english: At that moment I knew that I had been outgiven.
sentences.chinese: 在那一刻，我明白我得到了令我感愧的馈赠。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter. This part describes the asymmetrical principle of "Duoba" presenting.
sentences.chinese: 第六章，“多巴”馈赠中礼物的非对称性原则。

sentences.english: Kashi red copper have become a major tourist souvenirs and precious gifts.
sentences.chinese: 已成为重要的旅游纪念品及珍贵的馈赠礼品。

sentences.english: These are the real gifts the failures offer you.
sentences.chinese: 这些才是失败馈赠给你的真正的礼物。

definition: favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
to give a present/to accord (a favor)/to grant
favor from an emperor or high official
